data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guinot, Danièle (2008): A re-evaluation of the Dynomenidae Ortmann, 1892 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Brachyura, Podotremata), with the recognition of four subfamilies. Zootaxa 1850: 1-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183391
